comment: I took Dr. Justus again for the lab and he was just as good as the lecture. Very respectful, and eager to help, and he graded fairly. The difficulty rating is more to do with the course than him, learning how to use a game engine is tough but he made it much easier to learn. If you have issues just communicate with him and he'll help you out.

Dr. Justus is new to teaching but you couldn't tell if he didn't say that. He's very caring, gives great lectures, has lots of extra credit opportunities, and just has a very fun class overall. He's also very forgiving, if you miss an assignment due to something he'll usually be understanding and give you another shot. I can't recommend him enough!

Great person who truly cares about students succeeding. Was always willing to help out when stuck and responded to emails promptly. I strongly recommend people come in with some Unity game development experience. By the end of this lab course you will have to make a game that uses some advance programming skills. Do as many tutorials as you can!
